title: someone stol my Acc
body: hello all someone stole my Acc my acc name Heraa THE QUEEN , i sed riotsupport my ... thath person delete all my lol- friands change emeil change pass chane icon change  evryting ... how i can back my ACC  please anwer me /.

replies.body: Hope you get your account back

Wait for Riot's support team to get back with you. They're very busy and don't often get to tickets right away. 

Only Riot can help you with this. The community can do nothing to get your account back.

Please open a ticket at https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new to get help from our Player Support team. While many Rioters read the forums and community site, this kind of thing needs to be handled officially with a ticket.

Hope it gets sorted out soon.
